extraverted_function.title: Business
extraverted_function.description: A mechanism that must run smoothly. Everything is subordinated to efficiency and practical value.

introverted_function.title: Structural
introverted_function.description: Structure, clarity, system. A logical map of the world where everything is interconnected.

extraverted_function.title: Relationship
extraverted_function.description: Sees not behavior, but the soul. Reflection of inner states, empathy, personal reflection.

introverted_function.title: Emotions
introverted_function.description: Controls the mood of others through bright and expressive emotionsemotional vibrations.

extraverted_function.title: Volitional
extraverted_function.description: Strength, will, determination. Willingness to fight for your goals and assert your boundaries.

introverted_function.title: Comfort
introverted_function.description: Home, warmth. All the attention is on bodily sensations, cozy atmosphere and pleasant details.

extraverted_function.title: Time
extraverted_function.description: The flow of time, cycles, cause and effect. Sees the future through the present.

introverted_function.title: Potentiality
introverted_function.description: Flight of fancy, lots of ideas, freedom of options.
